summary: This document is a bank statement for Shocker Holdings LLC for the period of September 1, 2017, to September 30, 2017. It details account balances, transactions including withdrawals and deposits, and service charges associated with the account.

persons.name: Shocker Holdings LLC
persons.context: Shocker Holdings LLC is the entity associated with the bank account detailed in this statement.

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $18,354.45 and an ending balance of $946.93 for the statement period.
There were two outgoing wire transfers totaling $24,000.00 on September 26, 2017.
An incoming wire transfer of $6,592.48 was recorded on September 25, 2017.
The standard monthly service charge was waived due to the account meeting balance criteria.
The document contains confidential banking information related to Shocker Holdings LLC.
